_sText:
This map has been made by RuNnEr and .:a[Z]u:.


1.
copy the .bsp file to
<steamdir>/steamapps/<accountname>/counterstrike source/cstrike/maps

or if you have a root/gameserer to
<serverdir>/cstrike/maps

2.
enjoy playing

3. (optional)
if you run this map on your dedicated server type "net_maxfilesize 100" (without the ") in the server cfg to let people download it or move it to your FastDL Server.


The map includes:
- a working Generator room with button to switch lights off
- Doors in the corridors which opens if you come close
- big outdoor area
- walkable roof with vents
- some vents to get away from ct's


And thanks to everybody who let people like us download their custom Models/Textures here on the webs.
They're doing well in this map.
